goal.name: statcvs
goal.description: Fetch cvs log using repository defined in pom and generate CVS statistics for the current CVS project. You'll need to run maven xdoc (or maven site) to render the StatCvs reports as HTML (they are rendered as XML).

goal.name: statcvs:generate
goal.description: Same as the statcvs goal (see above).

goal.name: statcvs:generate-xdoc
goal.description: Only generate statistics from already existant cvs log file. Requires a prior invokation of the statcvs goal to download the log.
